snippet.title: Equilinox - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
You can buy Equilinox NOW on Steam for $9.99: https://store.steampowered.com/app/853550/Equilinox/

The Equilinox website:
http://equilinox.com

Equilinox is a sandbox nature game in which you can create and nurture your own diverse, dynamic, evolving ecosystem of plants and animals. Think of it like a city-builder game, except instead of cities you're building and managing ecosystems!

Music by Jamal Green:
https://soundcloud.com/jamalgreenmusic

Social Media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThinMatrix
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thinmatrix
Instagram: http://instagram.com/thin_matrix
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/equilinox
